name: Mechtacular
description:
Simple top down survival shooter that was never totally finished.

How to Play

Click to shoot (overheats)
Right Click to fire penetrating laser (cooldown)
Middle click to fire grenade at cursor location (cooldown)
Space to dash-teleport and stun (cooldown)

F1 or Tab to see settings.
H for help.
